summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to find out more about a product they purchased and to address issues they had been having with their account. The customer was having problems with being charged twice for the same purchase and not being able to get a refund. The agent apologized for the inconvenience and asked for the customer's account information so that they could look into the issue further. The agent also offered to provide information about other products and services that Contoso Wireless offers that could benefit the customer.
